description: Mugwort (Artemisia vulgaris) is a resilient and unique plant species that has been used for centuries in herbal medicine. It is an attractive woody perennial with a distinctive silvery foliage and small yellow-green flowers. Mugwort is revered for its healing properties, such as helping to soothe indigestion, aid in sleep, boost the immune system, and even to ward off evil spirits! It's also the key ingredient in a famous German beer called 'Gruit'. Whatever the usage, Mugwort is an amazing plant that continues to show its versatility by offering a variety of benefits to those who use it.
